muse.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to say something in a way that shows you are thinking about it carefully
muse.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: ‘Somewhere, ’ he mused, ‘I’ve heard your name before.’
muse.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to think about something for a long time
muse.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: He mused on how different his life would have been, had he not met Louisa.
muse.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: someone’s muse is the force or person that makes them want to write, paint, or make music, and helps them to have good ideas
muse.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: one of the nine ancient Greek goddesses who each represented a particular art or science
